overview_of_class: Most of our planet's surface is blanketed by ocean. The dynamic nature of the oceanic environment and how it influences the Earth as a whole will be explored in this course. The interconnectivity of ocean characteristics (chemistry, physics, geology, biology) will be stressed.
name: The Ocean, the Atmosphere & Our Climate
title: WCAS EARTH 106-0-01 The Ocean, the Atmosphere & Our Climate

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Most of our planet's surface is blanketed by ocean. The dynamic nature of the oceanic environment and how it influences the Earth as a whole will be explored in this course. The interconnectivity of ocean characteristics (chemistry, physics, geology, biology) will be stressed.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: In-class assignments and activities, and homework.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: No textbook or other materials required

class_attributes:
Natural Sciences Distro Area

Registration for laboratory section required
subject: EARTH
